txt.en: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirs….\n\nYour mission is to defeat Blúghosh, Emissary of Gorgar, at the Goblin-gate.
You have been tasked with dispatching Gorgar's emissary at the Goblin-gate.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The goblins of the Misty Mountains have long plagued the people of Rhovanion. A great horde of them still resides inside Goblin-town. It is imperative that we KEEP them inside the mountains, and prevent them from adding their forces to Gorgar's army. My scouts have seen a band of Orcs travelling south toward the Goblin-gate. They said one of them looked \qimportant\q. This may be an emissary from Gorgar, attempting to take control of Goblin-town once again. You must defeat him before that can happen!'
Complete Mission: Emissary at the Goblin-gate
Your mission is to defeat Blúghosh, Emissary of Gorgar, at the Goblin-gate.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to the Goblin-gate.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
'Well done! Once again, control of Goblin-town has been wrested away from the scourge in Gundabad. Keep up the good work, [placeholder]. We will win this war yet!'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt a brutal wounding attack.
